languages.text: "Нет жалости к тем, кто сослан на мир-тюрьму для искупления, а сам чинит беспорядки".
"I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."
languages.original_text: "Нет жалости к тем, кто сослан на мир-тюрьму для искупления, а сам чинит беспорядки".

traits.locale_text: "There is no pity for those who have beet exiled to the Penal World for atonement, and yet keep creating unrest around themselves."
"There is no pity for those who have beet exiled to the Penal World for atonement, and yet keep creating unrest around themselves."
"I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."
"I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."
"I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."

languages.text: “我从不同情那些被流放到刑罚世界的人。他们为了赎罪而做着苦力，可即便如此，他们依然不断在周围散播混乱。”
languages.original_text: "I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."

traits.locale_text: “我从不同情那些被流放到刑罚世界的人。他们为了赎罪而做着苦力，可即便如此，他们依然不断在周围散播混乱。”

languages.text: «No tengo piedad de quienes han sido exiliados a un mundo penal para su expiación y, sin embargo, siguen creando desorden a su alrededor».
languages.original_text: "I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo piedad de quienes han sido exiliados a un mundo penal para su expiación y, sin embargo, siguen creando desorden a su alrededor».

languages.text: 「アトーンメントのために流刑惑星に追放された人々を憐れむことはしない、奴らは未だに自分たちの周りに混乱を引き起し続けているんだ」
languages.original_text: "I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「アトーンメントのために流刑惑星に追放された人々を憐れむことはしない、奴らは未だに自分たちの周りに混乱を引き起し続けているんだ」

languages.text: « Je n'ai aucune pitié pour ceux qui ont été condamnés à l'exil sur un monde pénal et qui continuent à semer la pagaille autour d'eux. »
languages.original_text: "I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai aucune pitié pour ceux qui ont été condamnés à l'exil sur un monde pénal et qui continuent à semer la pagaille autour d'eux. »

languages.text: "Ich habe kein Mitleid mit jenen, die auf eine Strafwelt verbannt wurden, um Buße zu tun, dann aber weiter nur Chaos säen."
languages.original_text: "I have no pity for those who have been exiled to a penal world for atonement, and yet continue to create disorder all around themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe kein Mitleid mit jenen, die auf eine Strafwelt verbannt wurden, um Buße zu tun, dann aber weiter nur Chaos säen."
